medical_history.chief_complaint: Primary hyperparathyroidism (HPT) diagnosed during a study for metatarsal bone pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was diagnosed with HPT 10 years ago and had a recurrence with three enlarged parathyroid glands after a previous surgery to remove a single enlarged parathyroid gland. Symptoms progressed over the past decade.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient previously diagnosed with HPT; underwent total parathyroidectomy, thyroidectomy, thymectomy, and parathyroid autograft due to recurrence.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of hyperparathyroidism in the mother, one brother, two sisters, one cousin, and three daughters. Notably, the mother had parathyroid carcinoma.
